div.p: You know that your kids have something special inside them. We know it too. The Arkansas Virtual Academy (ARVA) and K12 ignite the minds of children like yours to bring learning and innate possibility alive. Together, we are helping Arkansas students in grades K–12 reach their true, personal potential.
We also offer the Destinations Career Academy at ARVA, which gives high school students the opportunity to explore career options and gain an edge for the future.
ARVA gives Arkansas kids in grades K–12 the chance to learn in ways that are right for them. ARVA offers:

ul.li: A full-time, tuition-free online public school option
Destinations Career Academy for high school students
Books, materials, and loaner computer system to qualifying families
The only statewide virtual public school program to offer the complete K12 experience
